item.title: Links
item.description: An ever-growing list of awesome artists, books, and useful links that I found over the years. Artists 2D Artists Will Murai Ursula Dorada 3D Artists Leticia Gillett Morgane Malville Dinamuuu3d Pablo Dobarro Studios Ilustrata Books The Animator’s Survival Kit Disney Animation: The Illusion of Life Courses 2D Art Ilustração para publicidade: crie uma identidade Fundamentos de Desenho 3D Art Modelagem 3D com Rafa Souza Animação 3D criativa no Blender Escultura digital com Blender 2.
